title: friends list in gifting center not updating
body: i decided to gift a random player a gift due to him being a really good sport on the other team. however after i added him as a friend and went to the gifting center he is still not appearing on the list for available recipients.

replies.body: That's really awesome of you to want to gift a player you met in-game!  Instant gifts should be available in the post-game lobby; however, anything after requires the restrictions per the [gifting center](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ) guide be met.  This means that you may have to wait a little bit before his name shows up.  I hope that helps!
